a) Abbreviated Designation of shan jing 善驚 , a tendency to be frightened. Su wen 素問 30: 聞木音 則惕然而驚 , “When he hears the sound of wood, he is scared and frightened ”.

b) Identical with jing chu 驚搐 , fright convulsion. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 因壯熱，便四肢 攣掣，驚，乃成癇疾 , “It is because of strong heat that the four limbs contract, [patients] experience fright , and this generates epilepsy ailment”. ④ Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of jing feng 驚風 , fright wind. Xiao er yao zheng zhi jue 小兒藥證直訣 Lj: 剪刀股丸，治一切驚 風，久經宣利，虛而生驚者 , “Pills with jian dao gu cure all types of fright wind, when one has applied, over an extended period of time, dissipating and disinhibiting [medication] resulting in the depletion and generation of fright ”. Jing bi 經閉 , menstrual blockage [22]

Alternative Names yue bi 月閉 ; xue bi 血閉 , [menstrual] blood blockage; yue jing yu bi 月經瘀閉 ; yue shui bu tong 月水不通. Pathological Condition of a failure of menstruation to begin in a young woman at the age of puberty, or a ceasing of menstruation for more than three months in a woman who is not pregnant. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 4: 牡蠣丸，治經閉不通，不欲飲食方 , “Pills with mu li : a recipe to cure menstruation that is blocked and fails to pass , with an unwillingness to drink and eat”.
